---

title: "Update data-link"

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/data-links/{dataLinkId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the data-link associated with the given `dataLinkId`. Allows modification of name, description, and associated credentials.
